snippet: Shirley L. Huntley, a Queens Democrat who pleaded guilty in a corruption scandal this year, recorded officials at the direction of law enforcement, according to court papers.
abstract: Shirley L. Huntley, Queens Democrat who pleaded guilty in a corruption scandal this year, recorded conversations with officials at the direction of law enforcement, according to court papers; action points to presence of a wider investigation into New York State officials.

byline.original: By THOMAS KAPLAN and WILLIAM K. RASHBAUM

lead_paragraph: Shirley L. Huntley, a Queens Democrat who pleaded guilty in a corruption scandal this year, recorded officials at the direction of law enforcement, according to court papers.

headline.seo: Ex-Senator Shirley Huntley Recorded Elected Officials
headline.main: Second Albany Legislator Secretly Taped Colleagues
headline.print_headline: Secret Taping by 2nd Official Rattles the State Legislature

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
keywords.name: subject
